title: Violated
extract: Violated is a European-only EP released by rap metal band Stuck Mojo. The album was released as a means of promoting the band for its first ever tour overseas in Europe. The EP includes a cover of Black Sabbath's "Sweet Leaf", as well as two live songs.
extract_html: Violated is a European-only EP released by rap metal band Stuck Mojo. The album was released as a means of promoting the band for its first ever tour overseas in Europe. The EP includes a cover of Black Sabbath's "Sweet Leaf", as well as two live songs.
